extracted_playbook.title: Identify Installed PHP Everywhere Plugin Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check the installed version of the PHP Everywhere plugin to determine if it is vulnerable.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the installed PHP Everywhere plugin version <= 2.0.3?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade PHP Everywhere Plugin to Version 3.0.0
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the PHP Everywhere plugin to version 3.0.0 to mitigate the vulnerability.
